languages.text: {n}Мужчина сглатывает, странно смотрит на вас и прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Да простит меня Император Человечества..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина сглатывает, странно смотрит на вас и прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Да простит меня Император Человечества..."
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}The officer swallows, gives you a strange look, and then closes his eyes.{/n} "Emperor forgive me..."

languages.text: {n}L'officier déglutit, vous jette un regard étrange, puis ferme les yeux.{/n} « Que l'Empereur me pardonne... »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer swallows, gives you a strange look, and then closes his eyes.{/n} "Emperor forgive me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier déglutit, vous jette un regard étrange, puis ferme les yeux.{/n} « Que l'Empereur me pardonne... »
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}军官咽了口唾沫，以古怪的眼神看了你一眼，随后闭上了眼睛。{/n}“愿帝皇原谅我……”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer swallows, gives you a strange look, and then closes his eyes.{/n} "Emperor forgive me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}军官咽了口唾沫，以古怪的眼神看了你一眼，随后闭上了眼睛。{/n}“愿帝皇原谅我……”
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}士官は押し黙り、不思議そうな表情をあなたに向けると目を閉じた。{/n}「皇帝陛下、お許しください…」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer swallows, gives you a strange look, and then closes his eyes.{/n} "Emperor forgive me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官は押し黙り、不思議そうな表情をあなたに向けると目を閉じた。{/n}「皇帝陛下、お許しください…」
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier schluckt, schaut dich seltsam an und schließt dann seine Augen.{/n} "Imperator verzeihe mir ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer swallows, gives you a strange look, and then closes his eyes.{/n} "Emperor forgive me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier schluckt, schaut dich seltsam an und schließt dann seine Augen.{/n} "Imperator verzeihe mir ..."
traits.speaker: OfficerInTerror

languages.text: {n}El oficial traga saliva, te mira de forma extraña y luego cierra los ojos.{/n} «Que el Emperador me perdone...».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer swallows, gives you a strange look, and then closes his eyes.{/n} "Emperor forgive me..."

languages.text: {n}Subay yutkunuyor. Sana acayip bir şekilde bakıp gözlerini yumuyor.{/n} "İmparator affetsin..."
